ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-105mm VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) + <2> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <5> Battery Charger + <6> 67mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<10> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
